| icon           = poe2 bronze_horn_icon.png
| description    = The surface of this ancient bronze horn is green with corrosion. Engwithan runes wind around the artifact from the bell to the mouthpiece. The glyphs were scrawled hastily and are nearly illegible, though it is possible to decipher portions of it. The message appears to be a warning of some kind.
